currently.description: AI-powered social media publishing CLI for LinkedIn and X. Works best with OpenClaw.

currently.title: Jigsaw Puzzle Solver AI
currently.description: Building the world's fastest jigsaw puzzle solver AI. Currently generating large-scale training data with a native macOS puzzle piece generator.

featured.title: Jigsaw Puzzle Solver AI
featured.oneLiner: Multi-step project to build the fastest jigsaw puzzle solver AI, starting with a native macOS data generation tool.
featured.outcome: Built a native macOS puzzle generator app producing training data at scale with bezier-curve interlocking pieces.
featured.description: A multi-phase project to create the world's fastest jigsaw puzzle solver AI. Phase 1: a native macOS app (Swift + SwiftUI) that generates realistic jigsaw puzzle pieces from any image using CGPath bezier curves. Pieces have randomised interlocking tabs/blanks, are exported as transparent PNGs with metadata JSON, and serve as large-scale training data for the solver model. Configurable grid sizes from 1x2 to 100x100.

featured.title: ClawPost
featured.oneLiner: AI-powered social media publishing CLI for LinkedIn and X. Works best with OpenClaw.
featured.outcome: Shipped a working CLI tool with AI generation, draft management, and scheduled publishing.
featured.description: ClawPost is a CLI tool that lets you generate, draft, schedule, and publish social media posts to LinkedIn and X from the terminal. Uses AI to generate platform-tailored content with refinement options. Works best with OpenClaw, the open-source AI engine.

featured.title: Langley Catalogue
featured.oneLiner: Construction pricing search platform with AI-powered semantic search, PDF ingestion, and analytics dashboard.
featured.outcome: Reduced item search time from ~5 minutes to under 1 minute per lookup.
featured.description: A full-stack construction pricing catalogue that ingests PDF source documents, extracts structured pricing data (materials, labour, rates), and provides both traditional full-text and AI-powered vector search. Includes a dashboard with search analytics, user management with role-based access, Excel import/export, PDF viewer, and an invitation-based registration system.

featured.title: Rebeka Beauty Salon
featured.oneLiner: Full-stack beauty salon platform with admin CMS, treatment booking, multilingual support, and review system.
featured.outcome: Delivered a production salon website with a full admin dashboard and content management system.
featured.description: A complete salon website with public-facing pages for treatments, pricing, and contact, plus a full admin dashboard for managing content. Features include multilingual support (language switcher), a review carousel with submission modals, treatment management with drag-and-drop ordering, image upload with cropping, marketing popups, and a REST API backed by Vercel Postgres.

featured.title: Synthetic Data for Fall Detection
featured.oneLiner: Final year project: VAE-based synthetic video generation pipeline for fall detection training data.
featured.outcome: Built a VAE pipeline that generates synthetic fall sequences from real video frames for data augmentation.
featured.description: Final year research project exploring variational autoencoders for generating synthetic fall detection training data. Pipeline covers frame preprocessing, chunk preparation, VAE training, and synthetic sequence generation.

featured.title: WhereWatt
featured.oneLiner: EV charger sharing app built as a Stanford Summer Session Technological Entrepreneurship prototype.
featured.outcome: Built a full mobile app with backend API, auth middleware, and charger data scraping.
featured.description: A React Native mobile app for finding and sharing EV chargers, built as a prototype for Stanford Summer Session's Technological Entrepreneurship course. Includes a Node.js/Express backend with authentication, charger data scraping, and route-based API structure.
